The night of ZEPETO park is brightening with light and fireworks!
If you want to find friends who have same interests, you can search #hashtags and find the rooms.
Selfie mode is upgraded too! Enjoy the park with your lovely friends!

Daily Quest is renewed!
Complete Quests every day & Earn Full Rewards.

Zepeto is totally changed!
You can send gifts to your friends, and some features are improved.
Find hidden treasure boxes in Zepeto World.
You can use special items!
Search by your friends' name now!
Avoid the Rolling Logs! Enjoy the New Party Game!

There was temporal problem on making your look-alike character.
Update this version. Zepeto'll work just fine!
